title: Diamond Nakshi Style Pendant - Chandrika Design
features: Features a crescent shape design with graduated rows of sparkling diamonds. Intricate nakshi-inspired detailing in a modern interpretation around a central leaf motif. The openwork design allows light to pass through, maximizing brilliance. The rose gold setting complements the diamonds and adds a touch of warmth.
occasions: or as a sophisticated everyday piece. An elegant choice for both traditional and modern attire.
description: A contemporary take on traditional Nakshi craftsmanship. The brilliant diamonds and rose gold create a luxurious and eye-catching piece. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, ensuring exceptional quality and durability. This is a versatile piece that can be dressed up or down.
